attributes.action: Block World Class UK Companies being Takeover
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jan 2010: The UK Government has no powers to prevent UK companies being takenover by foreign companies? 
Peter Mandelson's quote regarding Cadburys.
Yet other countries (France, USA,Swiss etc) do have the powers to protected  their own companies falling into foreign control.
